parameters.query: SELECT * FROM llm_routing_config WHERE task_type = $1 AND is_active = true LIMIT 1

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: $json.selected_model.replace('ollama/', ''), prompt: $json.prompt, stream: false, options: { temperature: $json.temperature, num_predict: $json.max_tokens } }) }}
={{ JSON.stringify({ contents: [{ parts: [{ text: $json.prompt }] }], generationConfig: { temperature: $json.temperature, maxOutputTokens: $json.max_tokens } }) }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: $json.success, output: $json.output, model_used: $json.model_used, cost_usd: $json.actual_cost_usd, routing_reason: $json.routing_reason, used_fallback: $json.used_fallback || false }) }}
